AI Description: The Matlab Engine API for Python provides a Python interface to the MATLAB engine. It enables you to call MATLAB functions and evaluate MATLAB expressions from within your Python environment.
Core Features: Allows Calling Matlab Functions & Evaluating Expressions From Python, Enables Integration Of Matlab Algorithms Into Python Scripts & Applications, Facilitates Data Sharing Between Matlab & Python Environments
Research Field: Engineering & Technology, Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences
